about_the_game:
Cannon fire is a game all about blowing your friends' ship to pieces, in Split-Screen mode for the best experience. The game uses a low poly artistic style to capture an almost Caribbean setting. The game has different types of ships witch all vary in size, damage, health and speed.

Ship types currently in game:
  • Galion
  • Warship
  • RPG jetski


[h1]This is a DEMO version, and does not include multiplayer or drops or other types of ships.[/h1]
